auth.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Aftermath Rentals - Your Complete Car Rental Management Platform
auth.welcomeSubtitle: Streamline your rental operations, track earnings, and manage your fleet with ease
auth.signupWelcome: Join Aftermath Rentals - Where Car Owners and Drivers Connect
auth.driverSignup: Sign up as a Driver to start earning with rental cars assigned by owners
auth.ownerSignup: Sign up as an Owner to manage your fleet and assign drivers to maximize your rental income
auth.checkEmail: Check your email ({email}) for a verification link
auth.clickVerificationLink: Click the verification link in the email
auth.completeProfileAfterVerification: You'll be redirected back to complete your profile
auth.emailNotReceived: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try signing up again.

profile.completeProfile: Complete Your Profile - Let's Set Up Your Rental Journey
profile.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Please complete your profile to get started with the rentals platform.
profile.driverProfileMessage: As a driver, you'll track your weekly earnings and mileage for assigned vehicles
profile.ownerProfileMessage: As an owner, you'll manage your fleet, assign drivers, and monitor rental performance
profile.driverDescription: I drive vehicles and track my earnings
profile.ownerDescription: I own vehicles and manage drivers
profile.chooseRoleCarefully: Choose your role carefully - this cannot be changed later
profile.driverAdditionalInfo: Track earnings and mileage for assigned vehicles
profile.ownerAdditionalInfo: Manage fleet, assign drivers, and monitor performance

reports.title: Weekly Reports
reports.noReports: No weekly reports found for the selected period.

incomeSources.title: Income Sources
incomeSources.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this income source?

carOwners.title: Car Owners Management
carOwners.noOwners: No additional owners assigned to this car.
carOwners.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this car owner?

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.manageCars: Manage your fleet of vehicles, assign drivers, and track weekly reports
dashboard.driverDashboardDescription: View your assigned cars and access reports for each vehicle.
dashboard.noCarsAssigned: No cars assigned to you yet. Contact an owner to get assigned to a vehicle.

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.password: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.carNotFoundMessage: The requested car could not be found.
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to assign this car
errors.failedToAssign: Failed to assign car to driver

carManagement.approveReportConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve this weekly report? This action cannot be undone.
carManagement.submitReportConfirm: Are you sure you want to submit this weekly report? Once submitted, you won't be able to edit it.

confirmations.removeCarOwner: Are you sure you want to remove this car owner?
